title: Heine and Nurse on African languages - conclusion

content.question: Which of the following conclusions can be made from the data included in the excerpt?

choices.label: Bantu is one of the largest linguistic families in Africa.
Khoisan and Bantu are closely related linguistic families.
Afrikaans developed from a Bantu language.

content.answer: Bantu is one of the largest linguistic families in Africa.

skill.text: 2.D: Describe and draw conclusions from patterns, trends, and limitations in data, making connections to relevant course content.
